059C64AB.Callback5Header: Find Derin's remains in the Shadowed Plunge

0871A46B.Toast: A young crusader wants the remains of a friend found.

8DCA476E.Phase9Description: Against all odds, the crusader Derin is alive in the Shadowed Plunge. Heâ€™s been injured. I need to give him a potion before he bleeds out.

92C33198.Phase12Description: Giving a potion to Derin gave him the strength to escape the Shadowed Plunge. I should return to Mateen and tell him his friend survived.

FAF02F4B.Phase6Description: A young crusader lost his friend in a cultist infested cave nearby. He fears the worst has befallen them and asked me to bring back any remains.
